attributes.action: All Sports involving National Teams Must Be Free To Air and not allowed to go to SKY TV
attributes.additional_details: Sky TV is making Massive profits through Pay Per View of sport of International Games. While the majority of people in their Millions can not afford their services are denied access to these events. It is important that all our children have access to these events. A sense of national identity and the benefit that sport can bring to them is vital. For once support something for the benefit of all in our country and not the profit making of news international.
